Posts.Content: HiÂ  This is the first i have wrote on this site, i had breast cancer in jan 2014, was bleesing from my left nipple for 2 years before they diagnosed me, i had a rare form of cancer called pagets disease of the breast, there was no option for me other than a mastectomy and 10 years on tamoxifen, i hope everything goes well with u Jackie
Posts.Title: Going out of my mind - lump and blood from left nipple
